name: Exposure-Based Counter-Tactics
description: Using calculated exposure strategies to neutralize PSNs without direct confrontation.

cards.title: Controlled Information Leaks
cards.description: Using selective truth release to disrupt PSN control structures.
bulletpoints: Timing information releases to maximize impact.
Using indirect channels to spread exposure without direct conflict.
Allowing PSNs to incriminate themselves through controlled information drops.
cards.summaryText: Time information releases for maximum impact, use indirect channels to spread exposure and avoid direct conflict, and let PSNs incriminate themselves through controlled information drops.

cards.title: Turning Public Opinion Against PSNs
cards.description: Shifting social perception by revealing uncomfortable truths.
bulletpoints: Using undeniable evidence to change public perception of manipulators.
Leveraging strategic storytelling to expose patterns of abuse.
Creating psychological distance between PSNs and their supporters.
cards.summaryText: Use undeniable evidence to shift public perception of manipulators, leverage strategic storytelling to expose abuse patterns, and create psychological distance between PSNs and their supporters.

cards.title: The Power of Witness Testimony
cards.description: Using multiple sources of testimony to create overwhelming credibility.
bulletpoints: Coordinating with other affected individuals to build a case.
Using collective testimony to counter individual gaslighting.
Structuring exposure campaigns to emphasize credibility and reliability.
cards.summaryText: Coordinate with other affected individuals to build a case, use collective testimony to counter individual gaslighting, and structure exposure campaigns that emphasize credibility and reliability.
